titles.title: To amend title VII of the Civil Rights Act of 1964 to require a reasonable attorney's fee to be awarded to the Equal Employment Opportunity Commission as a prevailing party.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and Labor

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Select Education and Civil Rights.

bill.summary: 3/4/1993--Introduced. Amends the Civil Rights Act of 1964 to require the awarding of attorney's fees to the Equal Employment Opportunity Commission if the Commission is a prevailing party.
